name: New Tab
description:
Best played alone in a dark, quiet room with the volume on.

Click "Run browser" to start. Then, just click and read whatever appears. You will know when the game ends... When it does, re-read everything on the screen - perhaps doing so may give you new insight into the meaning behind this game?

---------
Warning: As this game is an entry for a horror jam, those with a weak heart or prone to seizures may not wish to play it.

Audio credits are detailed in the text file audio_credits.txt within the downloadable zip file.
